com.max.medvedev.idea-jugglerd> idea-juggler Max Medvedev Open the current project in a new idea-juggler instance with isolated configuration.

Features:

  • Quick action to open current project in isolated IntelliJ instance
  • Keeps current window open while launching new instance
  • Each project gets dedicated config, system, and plugin directories
